A: Because I looked at you all night.

A: I'd better go get my daily 8 glasses of bourbon.

Q: Where do you come from, computer man? 
01010111 01101000 01100101 01110010 01100101 00100000 01100100 01101111 00100000 01111001 01101111 01110101 00100000 01100011 01101111 01101101 01100101 00100000 01100110 01110010 01101111 01101101 00101100 00100000 01100011 01101111 01101101 01110000 01110101 01110100 01100101 01110010 00100000 01101101 01100001 01101110 00111111 00100000

A: I was born in a small village in Romania and raised by a pack of wolves.
01001001 00100000 01110111 01100001 01110011 00100000 01100010 01101111 01110010 01101110 00100000 01101001 01101110 00100000 01100001 00100000 01110011 01101101 01100001 01101100 01101100 00100000 01110110 01101001 01101100 01101100 01100001 01100111 01100101 00100000 01101001 01101110 00100000 01010010 01101111 01101101 01100001 01101110 01101001 01100001 00100000 01100001 01101110 01100100 00100000 01110010 01100001 01101001 01110011 01100101 01100100 00100000 01100010 01111001 00100000 01100001 00100000 01110000 01100001 01100011 01101011 00100000 01101111 01100110 00100000 01110111 01101111 01101100 01110110 01100101 01110011 00101110
